EmailTemplate.name: Logo Format
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please send us Vector Line artwork in one of the following file formats: .ai, .eps, or .pdf. and note any Pantone colors. We are unfortunately not able to work with .jpeg, .png, or any file format which is not Vector. Vector artwork can be scaled without losing image quality.
Best,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
